classification_data.text: REPÚBLICA DE COLOMBIA IDENTIFICACIÓN PERSONAL CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA NÚMERO 59589391 CORTÉS ARIAS APELLIDOS LUIS HERNANDO NOMBRES FIRMA FECHA DE NACIMIENTO 18-MAY-1956 PURIFICACIÓN (TOLIMA) LUGAR DE NACIMIENTO 1.56 O+ M ESTATURA G.S RH SEXO 17-ENE-1976 PURIFICACIÓN FECHA Y LUGAR DE EXPEDICIÓN REGISTRADURÍA NACIONAL

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Looking at this Colombian identification document, I can see: - "REPÚBLICA DE COLOMBIA" at the top - "IDENTIFICACIÓN PERSONAL" - "CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA" - Number appears to be "59589391" - Names: "CORTÉS ARIAS" and "LUIS HERNANDO" - A signature and photograph section - Below that, there's information including: - "FECHA DE NACIMIENTO: 18-MAY-1956" - "PURIFICACIÓN" (appears to be place) - "(TOLIMA)" (department) - "LUGAR DE NACIMIENTO" - "1.56" (appears to be height) - "O+" (blood type) - "M" (gender - male) - "ESTATURA", "G.S. RH", "SEXO" - "17-ENE-1976 PURIFICACIÓN" - "FECHA Y LUGAR DE EXPEDICIÓN" - There's also a fingerprint image - A barcode at the bottom 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** This is clearly not BLANK or LINK_ONLY - it has substantial meaningful content. 3. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** This appears to be issued by the Colombian government identification authority, not DIAN (no DIAN logo or structure) and not Chamber of Commerce. 4. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** This is clearly a personal identification document - a Colombian Cédula de Ciudadanía (national ID card). It contains: - Personal biographical data (birth date, birth place) - Physical characteristics (height, blood type, gender) - Individual photo and signature areas - Individual ID number with personal names - Security elements (fingerprint, barcode, official format) 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** This matches CECRL perfectly: - Individual identification terminology: "IDENTIFICACIÓN PERSONAL", "CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA" - Comprehensive personal details confirm official identification document - Unique identifiers and physical characteristics validate its authenticity - Government-issued format with multiple security features - Precise biographical information from Colombian national registry The document provides definitive proof of individual identity through systematic verification elements.
